title: Windows 11 version 22H2 finally comes to the Beta channel, and thereâ€™s a ton of new features
content:
Today, Microsoft is releasing Windows 11 build 22581 to Windows Insiders in both the Dev and Beta channels. That’s right – this is the first Windows 11 version 22H2 build to make its way to the Beta channel, and that means there are a ton of new features to try out. Up until now, the

The post Windows 11 version 22H2 finally comes to the Beta channel, and there’s a ton of new features appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Windows Insiders in the Beta channel are getting their first taste of Windows 11 version 22H2 with build 22581 rolling out today.
